message.content:
Here is an example email:

Subject: Notification of My Departure

Dear [Boss's Name],

I am writing to inform you that, after careful consideration, I have decided to leave [Company Name], effective [Date of Last Day of Work]. This was not an easy decision for me to make, as I have truly enjoyed my time working with the team and appreciate the opportunities that I have had here.

I want to express my gratitude to you and the entire [Company Name] team for the support and experience I've gained during my tenure. I'm proud of the work we've accomplished together, and I'm grateful for the skills and knowledge I've acquired while working here.

I will do everything possible to ensure a smooth transition of my responsibilities and complete any outstanding tasks before my departure. If there's anything specific you'd like me to focus on during my remaining time here, please let me know.

If there's anything I can do to assist with the process of finding and training my replacement, please don't hesitate to reach out. I'm committed to making this transition as seamless as possible.

Thank you again for the opportunity to work at [Company Name]. I wish the company continued success in the future.

Best regards,

[Your Name]

Would you like me to change anything?
